DocLocalization.Name: Sich verjüngender Festkörper - aus extrudierter Fläche

DocAttribute.Name: EndSweptArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The surface defining the end of the swept area. It is given as a profile definition. The position coordinate system of the _EndSwptArea_ is generated by translating the _SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.Position_ along the _SELF\IfcExtrudedAreaSolid.ExtrudedDirection_ by the distance of _SELF\IfcExtrudedAreaSolid.Depth_.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectProfileAssignment
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _SweptArea_ as start profile and the _EndSweptArea_ as end profile shall be compatible.
